summary: Premna serratifolia is a small tree/shrub in the family Lamiaceae. It flowers and fruits between May and November. During flowering season, it attracts a large number of butterflies and bees. Synonyms of  Premna serratifolia Linn. include P. corymbosa (Burm. f.) Merr., P. integrifolia L. and  P. obtusifolia R. Br.).
